# precision 200;

let pt1(x,y) = y + 1/3;
let pt2(x,y) = 0.866 * x - 0.5 * y + 1/3;
let pt3(x,y) = -0.866 * x - 0.5 * y + 1/3;

#let pt1 = zeros pt1 (0);
#let pt2 = zeros pt2 (0);
#let pt3 = zeros pt3 (0);

#display pt1 pt2 pt3;

let s(x,y) = x^2 + y^2  - 1;
let c(x,y) = pt1(x,y)*pt2(x,y)*pt3(x,y) + 0.99/27 * s(x,y);

#let c = zeros c 2;
#display c c__t;

let s9(x,y,z) = 7.7980874564901533907e-03 * z^9 +
  3.5561040202832151365e-10 * 3.0000000000000000000e+00 * y * z^8 +
  1.2408375801556129410e-09 * 3.0000000000000000000e+00 * x * z^8 +
